sentences.sContent: Support for Mr Thompson is growing.
sentences.sCn: 汤普森先生的支持率在上升。

sentences.sContent: a tree which will grow well in most types of soil
sentences.sCn: 在大部分土壤里都能生长得很好的一种树

sentences.sContent: ...a tree would grow out of your mouth...
...Why have tea farmers in Kenya decided to grow purple tea...
...He says he must grow different kinds of tea if he is to survive...
...The fields grow golden yellow in autumn when the crops mature...
...Analysts expect the fast-food industry to grow modestly this year...
...With the world's population estimated to grow from six to nine billion by 2050...
...just like exercise ; just as muscles grow stronger with exercise...
...life can be difficult because they grow up in such an unreal atmosphere...
...because societies that grow richer use more energy...
...the world 's population is projected to grow from 6...

phrases.pCn: 成长为；长大到能穿着；变得成熟有经验
一起成长，共同成长；长在一起；长合，愈合；混合
产生于；因长大而丢弃；长得太高大

words.tran: 长大的；成年的；长满某物的
生长；变成；栽培（grow的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to become bigger, taller etc over a period of time in the process of becoming an adult
